name: AWSCodeDeployDeploymentGroupDeploymentRevision
description: Revision is a property of the AWS::CodeDeploy::DeploymentGroup property that defines the location of the AWS CodeDeploy application revision to deploy.

properties.name: GitHubLocation
properties.desc: If your application revision is stored in GitHub, information about the location where it is stored.
properties.type: AWS CodeDeploy DeploymentGroup Deployment Revision GitHubLocation

properties.name: RevisionType
properties.desc: The application revision's location, such as in an S3 bucket or GitHub repository. For valid values, see RevisionLocation in the AWS CodeDeploy API Reference.

properties.name: S3Location
properties.desc: If the application revision is stored in an S3 bucket, information about the location.
properties.type: AWS CodeDeploy DeploymentGroup Deployment Revision S3Location
